entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 70 this morning then becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
